original_title: Felt Right Then, Feels Right Now
overview: Depicts the childhood memory of Blyth trying on his fatherâ€™s boxers at age eight, before leaving for Brownies still wearing them under his uniform. This memory is one of many that have contributed to Blyth understanding that his gender identity did not align with the sex he was assigned at birth, leading to the artist coming out as transgender at eighteen.
title: Felt Right Then, Feels Right Now
